sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating"; import "../Styles/tour-details.css"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); //this is static data later we will call our API and load our data from database. const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); //destructure const { photo, title, city, desc, price, reviews, distance, maxGroupSize, address, } = tour; const { avgRating, totalRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); return (

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not Rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/Person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews({reviews.length})

1 2 3 4 5
); }; export default TourDetails;
